title: Be Good Wellness Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food concept juice bar and cafe offering drinks and light food. Two of the sandwiches are vegan suitable. Has almond milk for coffee. Has Wi-Fi. In the CityCenter mall by the bus terminal and railway station, opened Sept 2014.
